sentences.english: The day u open ur 61's Cheval Blanc IS a special day.
sentences.chinese: 你开61年白马庄的那天，就是特别的日子。

sentences.english: TTP teacher Shu Zhuang rehearse with her students for the last time before their big performance.
sentences.chinese: 实践剧场的淑庄老师跟学生们做最后的排练。

sentences.english: Zhuang Guiyang discusses the difficulty of analysing climate-change policy-making in China.
sentences.chinese: 庄贵阳在文章内讨论了中国在气候决策方面的难处。

sentences.english: Youfangzhuang area lies in the west of Northern Shanxi Slope, Ordos Basin.

sentences.english: During North Song Dynasty, the school of WANG An-shi formed a strong groups researching on Zhuangzi.

sentences.english: What was a small village ten years ago has developed into a prosperous city.
sentences.chinese: 十年前的小籿庄，现在已经发展成为一个繁荣的都市。

sentences.english: The length of the size curves of cocoon filaments within one lot varies at random.
sentences.chinese: 一个庄口中各根茧丝纤度曲线的长短是随机变化的。

sentences.english: History of Bosi Zhuang of Yang Zhou is a very interesting problem for us.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，波斯庄历史成为伊朗学者关注的问题。

sentences.english: and I worked for the world's largest winery, E&J Gallo, or Ernest and Julio Gallo winery.
sentences.chinese: 我在世界最大的酒庄，美国嘉露酒庄工作。

sentences.english: And it draws wide attention as to who will win the title again this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年“中级庄”的使用权又将花落谁家将备受关注。

sentences.english: The defendant ZhuangJianGuo assist LeiMingHua transport drugs, harm to society.
sentences.chinese: 被告人庄建国协助雷明华运输毒品，危害社会。

sentences.english: Is your signification that is my losing a very natural matter for dream Die that Ni son in Chuang?
sentences.chinese: 你的意思是我输给庄梦蝶那妮子是很自然的一件事？

sentences.english: Zhuang is also an independent researcher specializing in contemporary photography in Southeast Asia.
sentences.chinese: 庄吴斌也做独立研究，重点报道东南亚当代摄影。

sentences.english: Somebody opens the hotel for the shop sign, gamble in the village mainly.
sentences.chinese: 有的人是开酒店为幌子，主要是开赌庄。
